content: For the quarter ended June 30th, our net investment income was $0.29 per share, which includes $0.01 of other non-recurring income, the credit quality of the portfolio remained solid and the largest non-accrual investment marketplace events has returned to full accrual status. The portfolio of assets that is 100% floating rate, we're well positioned to substantially grow our net investment income as base rates rise, holding everything else constant in the portfolio, every 100 basis point increase in base rates translates into about $0.04 per quarter of net interest income. Overall, for our platform from inception through June 30th, our $335 million of equity co-investments have generated an IRR of 28% and a multiple on invested capital of 2.5x. For the quarter ended June 30th, net investment income was $0.29 cents per share, including $0.01 per share of other income. For the quarter ended June 30th, net realized and unrealized change on investments was a loss of $16.9 million or $0.41 per share. Holding everything else constant in the portfolio, a 1% increase in base rates translates into $0.17 per share annually of net interest income upside, and a 2% increase translates into $0.32 per share annually of net interest income.
